title: The law of demand and price changes

content.question: According to the law of demand, which of the following occurs when the price of a good increases?

choices.label: The demand for the good decreases.
The quantity demanded of a substitute good decreases.
The quantity demanded of a complementary good increases.
The quantity demanded of the good increases.
The quantity demanded of the good decreases.

content.answer: The quantity demanded of the good decreases.
